noise


functions to generate different types of noise
various mixers produce effects


NoiseType

type: C enum
description: types of noise
NOISE_PERLIN
NOISE_VALUE
NOISE_COUNT

PerlinNoise

typedef struct {
  uint permutation[512];
} PerlinNoise;
type: C struct
description: data struct for perlin noise

i_noise_perlin_seed

void  i_noise_perlin_seed(PerlinNoise *noise, uint32 seed);
type: C function
description: seed perlin noise data

i_noise_perlin_1d

float i_noise_perlin_1d(PerlinNoise *noise, float x);
type: C function
description: get one-dimensional perlin noise

i_noise_perlin_2d

float i_noise_perlin_2d(PerlinNoise *noise, float x, float y);
type: C function
description: get two-dimensional perlin noise

i_noise_perlin_3d

float i_noise_perlin_3d(PerlinNoise *noise, float x, float y, float z);
type: C function
description: get three-dimensional perlin noise

ValueNoise

typedef struct {
  float values[256];
  uint  permutation[512];
} ValueNoise;
type: C struct
description: data struct for value noise

i_noise_value_seed

void  i_noise_value_seed(ValueNoise *noise, uint32 seed);
type: C function
description: seed value noise data

i_noise_value_1d

float i_noise_value_1d(ValueNoise *noise, float x);
type: C function
description: get one-dimensional value noise

i_noise_value_2d

float i_noise_value_2d(ValueNoise *noise, float x, float y);
type: C function
description: get two-dimensional value noise

i_noise_value_3d

float i_noise_value_3d(ValueNoise *noise, float x, float y, float z);
type: C function
description: get three-dimensional value noise

NoiseSource

typedef struct {
  void     *data;
  NoiseType type;
} NoiseSource;
type: C struct
description: noise source used for mixers

i_noise_perlin_to_source

NoiseSource i_noise_perlin_to_source(PerlinNoise *perlin);
type: C function
description: get perlin noise as noise source

i_noise_value_to_source

NoiseSource i_noise_value_to_source(ValueNoise *value);
type: C function
description: get value noise as noise source

i_noise_1d

float i_noise_1d(NoiseSource source, float x);
type: C function
description: get one-dimensional noise from noise source

i_noise_2d

float i_noise_2d(NoiseSource source, float x, float y);
type: C function
description: get two-dimensional noise from noise source

i_noise_3d

float i_noise_3d(NoiseSource source, float x, float y, float z);
type: C function
description: get three-dimensional noise from noise source

NoiseMixerType

type: C enum
description: types of noise mixers
NOISE_MIXER_FBM
NOISE_MIXER_TURBULENCE
NOISE_MIXER_RIDGE
NOISE_MIXER_MARBLE
NOISE_MIXER_WOOD
NOISE_MIXER_PLANET
NOISE_MIXER_COUNT

NoiseMixer

typedef struct {
  NoiseMixerType type;
  uint           octaves;
  float          lacunarity;
  float          gain;
  union NoiseData
  {
    uint         marble_period;
    float        wood_coef;
    float        ridge_offset;
  } data;
} NoiseMixer;
type: C struct
description: noise mixer data

i_noise_fbm_1d

float i_noise_fbm_1d(NoiseSource source, uint octaves, float lacunarity, float gain, float x);
type: C function
description: get one-dimensional fractional brownian motion

i_noise_fbm_2d

float i_noise_fbm_2d(NoiseSource source, uint octaves, float lacunarity, float gain, float x, float y);
type: C function
description: get two-dimensional fractional brownian motion

i_noise_fbm_3d

float i_noise_fbm_3d(NoiseSource source, uint octaves, float lacunarity, float gain, float x, float y, float z);
type: C function
description: get three-dimensional fractional brownian motion
